login.regInfo: Choose your registration e-mail address carefully because lectors can restrict signing on their consultations just to certain e-mail domains, usually school ones.

passReset.enterMail: Insert your e-mail address connected with your account. We will send you an e-mail with further instructions

index.inFormat: Use format YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM or YYYY

consultation.restricted: Consultation is restricted only to users with e-mail domains {$1}
consultation.restriction: Restrict signing to chosen e-mail domains

profile.notifDesc: Here you can select default values which will be automatically preset while creating or signing on a consultation. You can then set notifications for each consultation manualy. If any chosen even occurs, you will be informed by an e-mail message. While signing out of consultation, chosen notifications will be removed.
profile.accChangeDesc: Lector account have the same abilities as student account plus the ability to create and manage consultations in the system. Lector accounts will be displayed in the dropdown menu of lectors on the main page. While changing to student account, users' created consultation will be hidden and user won't appear in the mentioned dropdown menu.

functions.notifLastMinLogout: User signs out {$1} hours before his section

ajax.initHistoryWith: has created a consultation starting {$1} {$2} with {$3} sections and with a note: {$4}
ajax.initHistoryWithout: has created a consultation starting {$1} {$2} with {$3} sections
ajax.disabledSecKick: has disabled sections: {$1} and removed the user(s) {$2}
ajax.deletedNote: has deleted the note of the consultation
ajax.editedNote: has changed the consultation note to: {$1}
ajax.signedOff: has signed out of the consultation

infoMsg.verifyMailSent: A message has been sent to provided e-mail address
infoMsg.mailToActivate: To activate your account we need to verify your e-mail address. An verification e-mail has just been sent.

errors.noAccWithMail: No account is linked with provided e-mail
errors.passMinLen: Password must have at least 6 characters
errors.passMaxLen: Password can't have more than 60 characters
errors.unverifiedLogin: Your e-mail address needs to be verified before loging in. An verification e-mail has just been sent again.
errors.accWithMail: Account with provided e-mail already exists
errors.konAllDay: Consultation can't take longer than 24 hours
errors.konPast: Unable to create a consultation in the past
errors.konOverlap: You already have a consultation in provided time from {$1} to {$2}
errors.actualPass: You must put in your current password

messages.passResMsg: Dear user, {PHP_EOL}{PHP_EOL}a request for password recovery has been made in app {APP_NAME} on address {HOME_URL} {PHP_EOL}You can ignore this e-mail if it wasn't created from your iniciative. In the other case you can recover your password by visiting following link where you choose your new password: {$1} {PHP_EOL}{PHP_EOL}Enjoy your day.
messages.sendMsgSignature: {PHP_EOL}{PHP_EOL}____________________________________{PHP_EOL}Message sent from application {APP_NAME} {HOME_URL}{PHP_EOL}by user {$1} {$2}{PHP_EOL}Consultation no. {$3}{PHP_EOL}held in {$4}{PHP_EOL}by lector {$5} {$6}{PHP_EOL}
messages.accVerifyMsg: Dear user,{PHP_EOL}{PHP_EOL}your e-mail address was used during registration in application {APP_NAME} on address {HOME_URL}{PHP_EOL}If you didn't register in the application, you can ignore this message.{PHP_EOL}If you DID register in the application, you can activate you account by visiting following link {$1}{PHP_EOL}{PHP_EOL}Enjoy your day.
messages.studLogoutMsg: User {$1} {$2} <{$3}>{PHP_EOL}has signed out from consultation from time {$4}{PHP_EOL}
messages.studLoginMsg: User {$1} {$2} <{$3}>{PHP_EOL}has signed on consultation on time {$3}{PHP_EOL}
messages.konNoteChangeMsg: Consultation note has been changed to:{PHP_EOL}{$1}{PHP_EOL}
messages.studNoteChangeMsg: User {$1} {$2} <{$3}>{PHP_EOL}in consultation section {$4} has changed his note to:{PHP_EOL}{$5}{PHP_EOL}
messages.sutdLogoutApolMsg: User {$1} {$2} <{$3}> has signed out from consultation with an apology: {PHP_EOL}{$4}

script.signoutPopup: If you want to sign out, at least consider sending a short apology or a reason to the lector.
script.konMenuInfo: Consultation no. {$1} on day {$2} with start at {$3}
script.konRlyDel: Are you sure you want to delete chosen consultation?
script.really: Are you sure you want to
script.konDelDisChosen: Sign out chosen users and disable sections
script.konNotifDesc: Notify me with a message when

other.metaDescription: Application for management of consultation appointments. Lector creates a consultation on which students then sign
